editGroupText: Define the main attributes of your exchange community.
currencyValueHint: The value of your currency in relation to the reference currency HOUR. It is used to calculate the exchange rate between your currency and others. Use the notation n/d. Eg, if you set 1/10, it means that 10 units of your currency are equivalent to 1 HOUR.
invalidCurrencyValue: Invalid currency value. Please use the notation n/d.
signupSettingsText: Define some settings for the signup process.
enableTermsOfUseHint: Require users to accept the terms of use before signing up.
minOffersHint: Minimum number of offers that a member must create during sign up.
minNeedsHint: Minimum number of needs that a member must create during sign up.
initialCreditHint: The maximum negative balance that an account can have after signing up. Changing this value will not affect existing accounts.
initialMaximumBalanceHint: The maximum positive balance that an account can have after signing up. Changing this value will not affect existing accounts. Leave to 0 for unlimited.
accountDefaultsText: Define the default settings for accounts in your currency. These settings may be overriden account by account. Changing these settings affect all accounts not having a specific value.
allowPaymentsHint: Allow users to send transfers to other accounts.
allowPaymentRequestsHint: Allow users to receive transfers from other accounts.
allowSimplePaymentsHint: Allow users to send transfers by choosing the recipient from a list.
allowSimplePaymentRequestsHint: Allow users to receive transfers by choosing the source from a list.
allowQrPaymentsHint: Allow users to send transfers by scanning a QR code.
allowQrPaymentRequestsHint: Allow users to receive transfers by showing a QR code.
allowTagPaymentsHint: Allow users to send transfers by showing a NFC tag.
allowTagPaymentRequestsHint: Allow users to receive transfers by scanning a NFC tag.
allowMultiplePaymentsHint: Enable the multiple send page to enter a batch of transfers.
allowMultiplePaymentRequestsHint: Enable the multiple receive page to enter a batch of transfer requests.
enableAcceptPaymentsAfter2wHint: Automatically accept all pending transfer requests after 2 weeks of inactivity.
enableOnPaymentCreditLimitHint: Increase the maximum negative balance of the account after receiving a transfer by the same quantity, up to a limit.
allowExternalPaymentsHint: Allow account to send and receive transfers to accounts in other currencies.
allowExternalPaymentRequestsHint: Allow account to request and receive requests of transfers from accounts in other currencies.
externalPaymentsText: Define the settings for transfers between accounts in different currencies.
enableExternalPaymentsHint: Allow to send and receive transfers to accounts in other currencies using the Komunitin protocol.
enableExternalPaymentRequestsHint: Allow to request and receive requests of transfers from accounts in other currencies using the Komunitin protocol.
enableCreditCommonsPaymentsHint: Allow to send and receive transfers to accounts in other currencies using the Credit Commons protocol. Not recommended for production use yet.
externalTraderCreditLimitHint: The limit of the total trade balance on the imports side.
externalTraderMaximumBalanceHint: The limit of the total trade balance on the exports side.
trustlinesText: A trustline defines the positive limit of the tade balance between your currency and a specific external currency. This limit is the maximum amount of external currency you are willing to accept in your group.
trustlineLimitHint: Trustline limit in your local currency units.
marketplaceText: Define the settings for the offers and needs within your community.
categoriesText: Offers and needs are organized in categories. Define the categories that will be available in your community.
deleteCategoryConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete the category {name}?
manageAccountsText: See below all accounts in your community. Most account settings can be set by default from the community settings page or individually. Credit Limit and Maximum Balance need to be set individually after the account is created.
creditLimitHint: The maximum negative balance that this account can have.
maximumBalanceHint: The maximum positive balance that this account can have. Leave to 0 for unlimited.
allowAnonymousMemberList: Allow external users to list community members
allowAnonymousMemberListHint: Allow users from any other community to see the list of names, avatars and account numbers of the members of this community. No emails or other personal information is shared.
hideBalanceHint: Hide the account balance and limits from other users.
suspendAccountConfirmText: Are you sure you want to suspend this account? The account won't be able to make or receive transfers until re-enabled by an admin.
groupStatusPendingText: The community is currently pending approval by the site admin.
groupStatusDisabledText: The community is disabled. Members are not able to log in or make transfers.
disableGroupConfirmText: Are you sure you want to disable the community {name} with code {code}? This action will disable all {members} members and remove all related accounts from the ledger. You can re-enable the community later, but all accounts will also need to be re-enabled. Only proceed if your project is finished and you want to prevent any further activity.
enableGroupConfirmText: Are you sure you want to enable the community {name} with code {code}? This action will restore the community and trustlines but does not automatically re-enable members or accounts. You will need to re-enable them manually.
